news.title: Private sector hiring rose by just 37,000 in May, the lowest in more than two years, ADP says
news.summary: The report comes two days before the more closely watched nonfarm payrolls count. The Bureau of Labor Statistics will release its report two days later.

news.title: Trump says 'Too Late' Powell must lower interest rates after weak ADP jobs report
news.summary: Trump has branded Powell with the nickname "Too Late" as a criticism of the Fed Chair's continuing decision to hold interest rates steady.

news.title: Trump says ‘extremely hard’ to make a deal with China’s Xi as trade stalemate fuels calls for leaders to talk
news.summary: The two countries have blamed each other for violating a trade agreement reached in Switzerland on May 12. The two countries are now at odds over who is to blame for the alleged violation.

news.title: Average 401(k) balances drop 3% due to market volatility, Fidelity says
news.summary: Fidelity Investments is the largest 401(k) provider in the U.S. Retirement account balances fell in the first quarter of 2025.

news.title: Government collapse plunges Netherlands in turmoil ahead of key NATO summit
news.summary: Right-wing leader Geert Wilders' exit from government ended the already fragile Dutch coalition. Wilders had been in power for just 11 months.

news.title: ‘I’m afraid to ask her’: My stepmother won’t show me my father’s will. What now?
news.summary: “She treats my sibling and me as virtual strangers,” she said. “She’s like a stranger to me.”

news.title: The smart money has cashed out big from these trendy funds. Now managers want the rest of us to buy in.
news.summary: Private-equity funds are increasingly available to retail investors. Be careful. Private- equity funds are often used to invest in real estate and real estate development.

news.title: Wells Fargo just got a green light from the Fed to grow. Here’s what it means for its business and its stock.
news.summary: Wells Fargo cleared major obstacle to its growth plans, opening the way for the bank to grow after years of restrictions related to its fake-accounts scandal.

news.title: He spotted weight-loss drugs and AI before they became hot. Here’s this investor’s next big idea.
news.summary: James van Geelen is the founder of Citrini Research. He is focused on the next stage of AI, surrounding humanoid robots.

news.title: Trade wars dent hiring, ADP finds: Paltry 37,000 gain in private jobs smallest since 2023
news.summary: Privately run businesses created just 37,000 new jobs in May. It was the smallest increase in more than two years. The worst global trade wars since the 1930s spurred many firms to put a pause on hiring.
